lyric:
[by:潮鸣夕落]
[01:07.12]standing still as they charge
[01:10.28]we will hold our ground not back down
[01:14.38]we will raise our swords from the ground
[01:18.55]and we will fight the war to end
[01:21.03]all the suffering
[01:23.54]never fearing
[01:25.59]heros foes
[01:27.19]or the daring
[01:29.56]and their cause
[01:31.32]to the gods we pray
[01:33.55]never waive
[01:35.33]time has come for us
[01:37.78]to take charge
[01:39.14]and fight the power
[02:13.88]standing still as they charge
[02:16.94]we will hold our ground not back down
[02:20.90]we will raise our swords from the ground
[02:25.05]and we will fight the war to end
[02:27.99]all the suffering
[02:30.32]never fearing
[02:32.32]heros foes
[02:33.75]or the daring
[02:36.27]and their cause
[02:37.87]to the gods we pray
[02:40.28]never waive
[02:41.98]time has come for us
[02:44.51]to take charge
[02:45.97]and fight the power
